A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I truly think that the backlash this movie is receiving will probably be forgotten after the next one is released.  I love the movie; it was very entertaining and it definitely sets itself apart from all of the other SW movies\, but I for one do not want more of the same.  All of the gripes (and there were only a few) I had have settled-down since seeing it for the first time\, but the main two things I was frustrated with (What happened to Leia\, and what happened to Luke) I now believe were put in motion for the third film.  My hope is that once that movie is released\, this one will be vindicated.  Although Empire is [probably] the most well received movie in the series\, it was not universally liked upon it's release.  People often forget that.
